effects.display_string: Set: Your minions deal 8% increased damage.
(4) Set: When you summon a minion, your Haste is increased by 1%, up to 4% for 8 sec.

Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Death Coil and Epidemic by 4.5%, stacking up to 10 times. Death Coil and Epidemic have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

(4) Set: Casting Dark Transformation grants up to 10 stacks of Winning Streak! and while Dark Transformation is active, the effectiveness of Winning Streak! is increased by 100% and it no longer has a chance to reset.
Set: Your minions deal 8% increased damage.

Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Death Coil and Epidemic by 4.5%, stacking up to 10 times. Death Coil and Epidemic have a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

(4) Set: Casting Dark Transformation grants up to 10 stacks of Winning Streak! and while Dark Transformation is active, the effectiveness of Winning Streak! is increased by 100% and it no longer has a chance to reset.

spells.description: Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Grasp the shard tightly to enrich yourself with crystalline energy, increasing your Mastery by 6,592 for 15 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: The shard draws in remnant energy from defeated enemies, increasing your Mastery by 139 for 15 sec, up to 5 times.

Equip: Your abilities have a very high chance to lash out with a Hateful Strike, inflicting 220,818 Physical damage to an enemy and healing you for 8,539. These effects are increased by 100% while you are below 35% health.
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

enchantments.display_string: Enchanted: Rune of the Fallen Crusader
